question: Display short stories and personal essays written by Evelyn O'Connor.
sql_query1:
SELECT Short_Stories.Title
FROM Short_Stories
WHERE Short_Stories.Author = "Evelyn O'Connor"
UNION
SELECT Personal_Essays.Title
FROM Personal_Essays
WHERE Personal_Essays.Author = "Evelyn O'Connor"
sql_query2:
SELECT Short_Stories.Title
FROM Short_Stories
UNION
SELECT Personal_Essays.Title
FROM Personal_Essays
WHERE Personal_Essays.Author = "Evelyn O'Connor"
interpretation1: What short stories and personal essays did Evelyn O'Connor write?
interpretation2: List all short stories and also display personal essays written by Evelyn O'Connor.
